metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0216 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: A use-after-free vulnerability was found in the LSI53C895A SCSI Host BusAdapter emulation of QEMU. The flaw occurs while processing repeatedmessages to cancel the current SCSI request via the lsi_do_msgout function.This flaw allows a malicious privileged user within the guest to crash theQEMU process on the host, resulting in a denial of service.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
